name: Psyops, Yo
description:
This is a whimsical romp to save the Top Stops from the horrific, horrific repression of the un-suns that blight the landscape. It has alternate good endings.

This should run in Lectrote or Gargoyle, or in a browser. It uses the Parchment interpreter.

Cover art credit (dirt texture): CC BY-SA 3.0 -- Heath Rezabek -- Vessel CC -- http://vessel.cc
